artist: Federico Zuccaro; verso attributed to Antonio Viviani
description: recto:  seated Madonna holding standing Christ child, on clouds at top center, surrounded by angels and cherubs in a ring, hand in hand; at bottom, three standing male saints, from left:  John the Baptist with his cross, man holding an open book, man holding a closed book in his PL hand and man in bishop's hat with crozier; verso:  scene of the descent from the cross with Mary behind Jesus, holding him beneath this PL arm; praying and mourning figures surround Jesus, with two ladders behind them; lower left corner of drawing is missing
dimension:
18 3/4 x 10 15/16 in. (47.7 x 27.78 cm) (sheet, recto)
12 1/2 x 8 3/8 in. (31.75 x 21.27 cm) (sheet, verso, irregular)
18 13/16 x 10 15/16 in. (47.78 x 27.78 cm) (mount, as folded)
marks:
Inscription

on back, in brown ink: [TADDEO ZUCC
title: Madonna and Child with Four Saints (recto); Piet√† (verso)
